name: Tenantplus
tag_list: apartments, renters, online-rent, pay-rent-online, search-apartments, roommates
overview:
Tenantplus is an online rent payment service specializing in the needs of tenants, renters, landlords, and property managers. Tenantplus offers a free apartment search and listing service for property managers. Search millions of apartments for rent nationwide with our apartment and home rental listing service. If you’re searching for apartments, pet friendly apartments, homes for rent, condos, town homes, duplexes, or lofts, tenantplus offers rental listings that will help you find the perfect home.

Tenantplus also provides resources for apartment renters in our moving center such as finding roommates, moving companies, credit checks and much more.

Tenantplus provides a unique forum for property managers and renters to come together to fulfill each othersâ€™ needs. It is an online tools and support company geared towards providing services to each of these groups. Since these are both vast and disparate groups, Tenantplus has broken them down further into a broadly demographic set of market segments. This assures TP the opportunity to exploit these market subsets with regards to advertising. Advertising revenue is the main source of TPâ€™s revenue, and as such, needs to be serviced on a continual and innovative level on par with the development and servicing of our online tools and services.

Tenantplus truly provides a valuable service to the property manager/renter community, and reasonably uses the opportunity to expose our customer base to relevant and useful information through both social networking and advertising. Every way our customer base can be segmented based on unique needs provides more opportunity for exposure.

Typically everyone has been part of this group at one time or another in their adult lives. Tenantplus provides these vast multitudes with the tools they need to navigate this time period successfully and with ease. In return, we find that our customers are duly responsive to commercial offers made to them while using most of our key features for free.
